title: match history graphs
body: just asking, how do i make a graph like the ones on leagues match history? doing a project of win/loss ratios and thinking of using some sort of line chart, but have no idea on how to make one. Anyone know how?{{item:2054}}

replies.body:
Hey man,

Sounds cool! is this for personal improvement?

The easy way is using sites out there that do it already

oce.op.gg
Carry.gg

Or you can do a basic version using Excel/Google Sheets and using the graph functions

OR if you want to make it super cool and a bit more automatic then you can look to use Riot APIs to develop your own personal, customised match history viewer.

https://developer.riotgames.com/

"We support personal improvement!"
nek minnit
"NO SANDBOX."

mfw

hi, this is for a project for my own improvement and the developer website sounds pretty cool. The thing is every time i go on it an error opens up saying 'certification base authentication failed.'  {{item:3070}} {{champion:32}} {{item:3070}} you know how to fix it?
